Easy.Q: If there are 1 cat and 2 dogs, how many animals are there?
If there are 2 cows and 3 chickens, how many animals are there?
If there are 4 rabbits and 1 turtle, how many animals are there?
If there are 3 birds and 2 fish, how many animals are there?
If there are 5 horses and 0 sheep, how many animals are there?
If there are 6 ducks and 1 goose, how many animals are there?
If there are 2 pigs and 4 goats, how many animals are there?
If there are 7 frogs and 2 lizards, how many animals are there?
If there are 8 squirrels and 1 rabbit, how many animals are there?
If there are 3 foxes and 5 raccoons, how many animals are there?

If there are 15 dolphins and 10 seals, how many animals are there?

If there are 28 beetles and 2 ants, how many animals are there?

Hard.Q: If there are 300 tigers and 500 lions, how many animals are there?
If there are 400 dolphins and 600 whales, how many animals are there?
If there are 350 eagles and 650 falcons, how many animals are there?
If there are 275 crocodiles and 725 alligators, how many animals are there?
If there are 900 beetles and 100 bees, how many animals are there?
If there are 450 snakes and 550 frogs, how many animals are there?
If there are 700 ants and 300 termites, how many animals are there?
If there are 500 cheetahs and 600 panthers, how many animals are there?
If there are 750 monkeys and 350 gorillas, how many animals are there?
If there are 1200 crabs and 800 lobsters, how many animals are there?
If there are 1500 fireflies and 1500 moths, how many animals are there?
If there are 3500 sharks and 1500 rays, how many animals are there?
If there are 2500 scorpions and 2500 tarantulas, how many animals are there?
If there are 4000 sparrows and 3000 pigeons, how many animals are there?
